text: Abandu bomungâ€™otio (bomushitsimi- bomumasookholio)	baboola mbu khwasuubila, bola mbu mushili okhusuubila, halali boole mbu khwinjile mubwisilamu, obusubili, bushili okwinjila mimioyo chienyu, neni muloonde ka Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe shalabalemilia shiosishiosi mubikhole bienyu tawe, toto Nyasaye nomulesheli wobukoosia muno
